member.name: T:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager
member.summary: Utility Class for Managing AuditTrail Archives

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.GetAuditTrailsCountForArchive(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Gets the Count of AuditTrail Records in a Specific AuditTrail Archive
!!Throws Exception on Error!! Possible Exception Codes: UNKNOWN_ARCHIVE

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.GetArchiveKEY(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Obtain the ArchiveKEY of an AuditTrail Archive for a specific System and Reference Record No
!!Throws Exception on Error!! Possible Exception Code: AUDITTRAIL_ARCHIVE_NOT_FOUND
member.param: Eg. Asset ID, WorkOrder ID etc.

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.CreateAuditTrailArchive(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Creates a new Record-Specific AuditTrail Archive [TRANSACTION IS MANDATORY] This function is required to be executed within an ambient TransactionScope
!!Throws Exception on Error!! Possible Exception Codes: UNKNOWN_SYSTEMCODE UNKNOWN_SITEKEY UNEXPECTED_DATABASE_ERROR
member.param: Optional Display ID for the AuditTrail Archive. It will be used as the title of the AuditTrail Archive WebPage
Unique Identifier of the Application-Specific Record that requires a dedicated AuditTrail Archive to be created for storing record-specific AuditTrails, eg. Asset ID, WorkOrder ID etc
member.returns: Returns the ArchiveKEY of the newly generated AuditTrailArchive on Success

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.ModifyAuditTrailArchiveIDAndRecordNo(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Modify the reference RecordNo and AuditTrailArchiveID for a specific AuditTrailArchive
[TRANSACTION IS MANDATORY] This function is required to be executed within an ambient TransactionScope
!!Throws Exception on Error!! Possible Exception Code: SYSTEMWIDE_AUDITTRAIL_ARCHIVE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED UNABLE_TO_LOCATE_AUDITTRAIL_ARCHIVE_FOR_MODIFICATION
member.param: The Unique Identifier of the Target AuditTrail Archive
Eg. AST-MNT-MGT, MAT-MGT or MAT-PRC-MGT
Renamed Display ID for the AuditTrail Archive. It will be used as the title of the AuditTrail Archive WebPage
Renamed Unique Identifier of the Application-Specific Record that requires a dedicated AuditTrail Archive to be created for storing record-specific AuditTrails, eg. Asset ID, WorkOrder ID etc

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.DeleteAuditTrailArchive(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary:
Deletes a record-specific AuditTrail Archive when its no longer required. Cascade delete all the contained AuditTrail Records.
This operation requires 3 different Unique Identifiers to be specified to reduce the risk of accidentally deleting the wrong AuditTrailArchive.
[TRANSACTION IS MANDATORY] This function is required to be executed within an ambient TransactionScope
!!Throws Exception on Error!! Possible Exception Codes: SYSTEMWIDE_AUDITTRAIL_ARCHIVE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED UNABLE_TO_LOCATE_AUDITTRAIL_ARCHIVE_FOR_DELETION
member.param: The Unique Identifier of the Target AuditTrail Archive
The Unique Identifier of the Application-Specific Record that is linked to the target AuditTrail Archive, eg. Asset ID, WorkOrder ID etc

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.InsertAuditTrailRecord(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.eAuditTrailRecordType,FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.eAuditTrailSeverity)
member.summary:
Insert a new SYSTEM-GENERATED AuditTrail Record into a specific AuditTrail Archive. (User Signature and Remarks are not required)
[TRANSACTION IS MANDATORY] This function is required to be executed within an ambient TransactionScope
!!Throws Exception on Error!! Possible Exception Code: SUCCESS, UNKNOWN_ARCHIVE, UNKNOWN_CATEGORY_FOR_SPECIFIC_SUBSYSTEM, UNEXPECTED_DATABASE_ERROR
member.param: The Unique Identifier of the Requesting Application
The Unique Identifier of the Target AuditTrail Archive
CategoryName of the AuditTrailCatogory for AuditTrail Record
Title of AuditTrail Record
Details of Event/Action recorded by AuditTrail Record
The Type of AuditTrail Record
The Severity of the Event/Action recorded by AuditTrail Record
member.returns: Returns the Current Count of AuditTrail Records in the target AuditTrailArchive

member.summary:
Insert a new AuditTrail Record, for recording specific User-Actions, into a specific AuditTrail Archive.
[TRANSACTION IS MANDATORY] This function is required to be executed within an ambient TransactionScope
!!Throws Exception on Error!! Possible Exception Code: SUCCESS, UNKNOWN_ARCHIVE, UNKNOWN_CATEGORY_FOR_SPECIFIC_SUBSYSTEM, UNEXPECTED_DATABASE_ERROR
member.param: The Unique Identifier of the Requesting Application
The Unique Identifier of the Target AuditTrail Archive
CategoryName of the AuditTrailCatogory for AuditTrail Record
Title of AuditTrail Record
Details of Event/Action recorded by AuditTrail Record
The Type of AuditTrail Record
The Severity of the Event/Action recorded by AuditTrail Record
Signature of the User who performed the action(s) that is being recorded in AuditTrailRecord
User Remarks
member.returns: Returns the Current Count of AuditTrail Records in the target AuditTrailArchive

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.GetSupportedSitesDictionary
member.summary: Gets Dictionary containing all the existing Sites configured for the AuditTrails Mgmt System KEY: SiteName Value: Site object

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.GetSupportedApplications
member.summary:
Dictionary of all Applications supported by the AuditTrails Mgmt System
KEY: SysCode

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.GetAuditTrailCategories(System.String)
member.summary:
Obtain a list of Configured AuditTrail Categories for a Supported Application
!!Throws Exception on Error!! Possible Exception Codes: UNKNOWN_SYSTEMCODE NO_AT_CATEGORIES_DEFINED_FOR_SPECIFIC_SYSTEM

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.AuditTrailsMgmt.AuditTrailArchiveManager.GetApplicationLevelAuditTrailKEYs(System.String)
member.summary:
Obtain Dictionary of pre-configured Application-Level AuditTrail KEYS for a Supported Application
KEY: SiteKEY VALUE: AuditTrailArchiveKEY
Each supported Applications will be issued 1 Application-Level AuditTrail Archive for each Site
!!Throws Exception on Error!! Possible Exception Code: UNKNOWN_SYSTEMCODE
